FuncDef: This command configures the network address to use in application definition. The network address will match the destination IP address in a from-sub flow or the source IP address in a to-sub flow.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a comparison operator indicating that the value configured and the value in the flow are equal.
Specifies a comparison operator indicating that the value configured differs from the value in the flow.
Specifies the name of an IP prefix list, up to 32 characters.
